title: csvw attributes
description: Schema for CSVW files that contain Metadata descriptions for Tabular Data in CSV. More details in https://www.w3.org/ns/csvw

tableSchema.description: A single schema description used as the default for all the tables in the group

name.description: Name for the column. If the CSV has a header, it should be one of the names of the columns in the header row

datatype.description: The main datatype of the values of the cell. Use JSON schema types

titles.description: Description of the column. Can be an array but it is not implemented in Tapis

propertyUrl.description: URI of the definition of the variable, e.g. QUDT URI

unitMeasureTitles.description: Description of the units of measurement. Extension of the CSVW based on W3C datacubes. Can be an array but it is not implemented in Tapis.

unitMeasureSymbol.description: Simbol of the units of measurement. Extension of the CSVW based on W3C datacubes.

unitMeasureUrl.description: URI of the definition of the units or measurement, e.g. QUDT URI. Extension of the CSVW based on W3C datacubes.

dialect.description: Hints to parser the described file

delimiter.description: Sets the delimiter character in a CSV file. Use '	' if the delimiter is a tab character.

header.description: Indicates if the CSV has a header first row, unless headerRowCount is provided, in which case the value provided for the header property is ignored.

headerRowCount.description: Number of rows in the csv table that are headers. Not implemented in Tapis
